headline: Looking At The Narrative For Cadence Bank After Agreed Sale To Huntington
summary: Cadence Bank’s fair value estimate has been refreshed to US$44.00 per share, up from US$42.70, with the change closely tied to new assumptions around its all stock sale to Huntington Bancshares. The updated work also nudges the assumed revenue growth rate to about 11.51%, reflecting analyst attention on how the planned combination could support the top line once Cadence sits within Huntington’s broader Texas and Southeast footprint. As the merger story unfolds and opinions stay split between...
